course_main_structural_unit.address:
Riia 23, ruumid 201, 205, 208, 303, 305, 306, 310
51010 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Molecular diagnostics, DNA and RNA extraction, measurement of DNA/RNA quality and concentration, PCR, Sanger sequencing, mutation analysis using RFLP, analysis of eukaryotic RNA, absolute and relative quantification of nucleic acids using RT-PCR method, Western blot, introduction of new genomics technologies.
description.et: Molekulaardiagnostika, DNA eraldamine, kontsentratsiooni, kvaliteedi, primaarstruktuuri määramine, PCR, mutatsioonanalüüs RFLP meetodil, eukarüootse RNA analüüs, absoluutne ja suhteline nukleiinhapete kvantiseerimine RT-PCR meetodiga, Western blot, uute genoomikatehnoloogiate tutvustus.

objectives.en: Goal of the practical course is to give the experimental experience of the previously studied methods.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on anda üliõpilastele praktilise töö kogemus ja kinnistada loengukursustel õpitut praktilise töö käigus.

learning_outcomes.en: After the course, the students are expected:

To be familiar with main research methods in today's molecular biology and gene technology (isolation and purification of DNA and RNA, molecular diagnostics, PCR, sequencing) and can use these methods for practical applications.
learning_outcomes.et: Omab ettekujutust tänapäeva molekulaarbioloogia ja geenitehnoloogia põhilistest uurimismeetoditest (DNA ja RNA eraldamine ja puhastamine, molekulaardiagnostika, PCR, sekveneerimine) ja oskab neid meetodeid praktikas rakendada.

learning_outcomes.en: To know and apply in practice methods for quantifying and measuring the quality of nucleic acids.
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab kasutada nukleiinhapete kvantiseerimise ja kvaliteedi hindamise meetodeid

learning_outcomes.en: To be familiar with basics of data analysis and databases and knows how to use them in practice.
learning_outcomes.et: On tuttav andmeanalüüsi põhialuste ja andmebaasidega ja oskab neid praktikas kasutada.

notes.et: There will be two groups, one in the morning and on in the evening.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.recommended_materials: Molekulaarse biotehnoloogia praktikumi juhend, loengute slaidid
